name: Children of the Sea
description:
Introducing: The Squishies!

The squishies are friendly sea creatures that love to wear masks. Depending on their personality, they wear different ones!
These fun creatures live in a sea-fantasy world above their mother: Kai the whale!
Choose your favorite one and enter the world of Children of The Sea!

Features:

  • Gems unlock more squishies!
    • You can unlock different squishies as you collect more gems!
  • A variety of skills!
    • Each squishy has a different skill that can help you win specific minigames!
  • Minigames for everyone! 
    • Children of the sea features 4 minigames with different puzzles and mechanics, have fun playing with the squishes and their friends!

Controls (XBOX Controller):
Joystick - Player Movement
A - Jump or Select
Y - Back or Select
X & B - Select
